experience.title: Solutions Architect
experience.description: Work closely with customers on deploying the InteliGate solution for automated vehicle access. Designed and developed client web applications using the latest technology (React.js, Golang, Node.js, MongoDB) – online platform for education and legal services. From a one liner client requirement, develop a roadmap and technical guide to achieve the desired outcome including the selection of appropriate tech stack and deployment options. Work with UI/UX team on getting a wireframe, daily stand-up meetings with front-end / back-end teams to deliver the solution on time.
